scene_target: Kaelen survives the collapse of the High Spire and commits to his new path as a fugitive.
goal: Escape the collapsing Spire while protecting the relic and maps.
conflict: Physical exhaustion and catastrophic structural failure versus the need for survival.
required_callbacks: pewter filament in the radius bone
black starwrought scarring on right arm
end_condition: Kaelen lands clear of the Spire's footprint and witnesses its final descent into the void.

world_updates.location: The ruins of the High Spire - Valley Floor
recent_facts: Kaelen escaped the High Spire as it collapsed into violet smoke and light.
The physical pewter filament in Kaelen's radius bone is severely strained but intact.
Kaelen has secured the Star-Maps and the physical star-shard in his satchel.
The High Spire is completely destroyed, leaving only a hollow in the world.
Kaelen is now a fugitive, alone and injured at the edge of the impact zone.

last_scene: Kaelen navigated the catastrophic collapse of the High Spire, narrowly escaping the Inner Sanctum as it was unmade.
He used the star-shard's resonance to blast through the battlements and jumped into the void as the tower folded in on itself.
Kaelen survived the fall and landed in the valley ruins, now a fugitive carrying the Order's last maps and a dangerous relic.
key_events: Kaelen felt the physical pewter filament of his Oath grinding in his radius bone during the escape.
The High Spire underwent a total structural and magical failure, dissolving into violet mist.
Kaelen secured the Star-Maps and the physical star-shard before the Spire's destruction.
Kaelen used shard-resonance to disintegrate a jammed door on the battlements.
Kaelen witnessed the final unmaking of the High Spire from the valley floor.
Kaelen accepted his new role as a fugitive and began his journey away from the ruins.
must_stay_true: The Starwrought Oath is a physical pewter-colored filament woven into the marrow of the radius bone.
The star-shard is a physical object currently held in Kaelen's satchel.
Starfall corruption is characterized by a rhythmic 'thump-hiss' resonance and violet light.
Kaelen's right arm bears extensive black starwrought scarring.
The High Spire is completely destroyed and no longer exists as a physical structure.
Kaelen is the sole survivor of the High Spire's final moments.
chapter_so_far_add: Kaelen has successfully fled the ruins of the High Spire with the Star-Maps and the first star-shard.
story_so_far_add: Kaelen, a former Warden of the High Spire, has claimed a fallen star-shard and secured ancient Star-Maps. After the Spire's collapse and the death of his commander, he is now a fugitive carrying the only key to the starfall's mystery.
